articles.content: Fans, rejoice. McDonalds is finally bringing back the McRib this December 2. The fast food chain will be making the popular sandwich available at all of its 14,400 restaurants stateside for the first… [+980 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Israel starts human trials on COVID-19 vaccine as schools slowly reopen - Reuters
articles.description: Israel began human trials on Sunday for its COVID-19 vaccine candidate which, if successful, could be ready for the general public by the end of next summer.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Israel began human trials on Sunday for its COVID-19 vaccine candidate which, if successful, could be ready for the general public by the end of next summer.
